fact-4.value: A.G. BARR p.l.c. (the “Company”) and its subsidiaries (together the “Group”) manufacture, distribute and sell soft drinks and cocktail solutions.  The Group has manufacturing sites in the UK and sells mainly to customers in the UK with some international sales.

fact-7.value: Westfield House, 4 Mollins Road, Cumbernauld, G68 9HD
